title: Defender torched after crash claims life of man in Kuliyapitiya
body_lines: A group of men set a fire to a Defender jeep following a crash in which a 38-year old motorcyclist died in Kanadulla, Kuliyapitiya.
After the crash, the bystanders attacked and set fire to the Defender vehicle when the men tried to take the luxury vehicle to the police station.
TThree persons including the driver of the Defender had been arrested by the Kuliyapitiya Police.
